abstract.text: A set of open source modules underpinning the legacy implementation of the Security framework.
A set of open source modules underpinning the legacy implementation of the Security framework.
Secure network communication using standardized transport layer security mechanisms.
Implement Apple's Secure Download System in macOS.

inlineContent.text: This technology is deprecated starting in macOS 10.7 and unavailable in iOS. Use the higher level services found throughout the Security framework instead.
